definition: to die young or prematurely/to come to a premature end/to be aborted prematurely
variant of 夭[yao1]/to die young/to die prematurely/Taiwan pr. [yao3]
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: In Africa, one child dies of the disease every 30 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，每30秒就有一个孩子因为疟疾而夭折。

sentences.english: A cihuateteo is the restless spirit of a woman who has died in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 恶灵是分娩时就夭折的女婴魂灵。

sentences.english: The peace talks were nipped in the end.
Sweet son died, XiaoRong fragrance did adopted mother.
sentences.chinese: 芬芳儿子夭折，晓荣认芬芳做了干妈。

sentences.english: In 1882, a baby girl caught a fever that was so fierce she nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 一八八二年，一名女婴因发高烧差点夭折。

sentences.english: Since there's no goal, Sim City soon palls.
sentences.chinese: 既然没有目标，模拟城市很快夭折了。

sentences.english: Their children are better nourished, less likely to die in infancy and more likely to attend school.
sentences.chinese: 其儿童营养更好，不易夭折，更有可能入学。

sentences.english: On the far left, a woman holds her dead child and howls in pain.
sentences.chinese: 在最左端，一位妇女怀抱夭折的孩子，失声痛哭。

sentences.english: It too came to naught, when Mr Yang was arrested in China for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 它最后也夭折，当时杨斌因为在中国逃税而被逮捕。

sentences.english: Antigone is the girl who will rise up alone and die young.
sentences.chinese: 安提戈涅是女孩谁将奋起独自夭折。

sentences.english: Or should pregnant women be able to abort their children before they are even born?
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的妇女能让她们的孩子还未出生就夭折吗？

sentences.english: She had seventeen children and two of them died.
sentences.chinese: 她有十七个孩子，其中两个夭折了。

definition: fetus dies in the belly/(fig.) plans or projects failed before being carried out
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
to fall ill and die/to die of illness
to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
